title: Agile & SCRUM
content: Chapter 2 Agile & SCRUM This chapter is focused on learning Agile methodology and apply SCRUM to your projects.

title: Presentation
content: Chapter 3 How to perform effective Presentation This chapter is mainly focused on the final presentation of a product.

title: Material
content: Chapter 4 SCRUM Material This chapter is focused on providing the templates and the material to help in the SCRUM implementation.

title: Focus Group Session
content:
Chapter 5 Focus Group Session This session is aimed at discovering main requirements and design our application for the further development. The class will be sub-divided into the following topics:
 Workshop Quizz (15 min) Ideas Concept Presentation and Comments (45 min) Requirements gathering & Architecture Design (2h)

title: ScrumTemplates
content:
SCRUM templates This part of the material have SCRUM templates to be used in your repository Wiki.
 Sprint Planning Templates Daily Meeting Templates Spring Review Spring Retrospective

title: Brainstorming
content:
During the next 1h we will work in group in order to gather user stories for the different users of the application. With that aim, we need to:
 Firstlly, we need to individualy think in specific application requirements based on the group idea presented.
 We need to group requirements by similarity and build the user stories of our application.
  For both tasks, we could use the following material:
 Brainstorming Template

title: Sprint Distribution
content:
After the workshop, there is also required to deliver the sprint distribution and the initial architecture design. To do that, we provide some template to make your inspiration:
 Sprint Distirbution Template

title: Product Backlog
content:
This material is required to having a sprint backlog documented before passing the stories to Zenhub. This document will be the result from the “Focus Group Sessions”.
 Template in Markdown Template in Doc

title: Workshop Quiz
content:
Today, after the workshop, we will play a game just to know your opinion about the workshop and the idea generation. The answers won’t affect your results neither the teachers relationship. It is just to help to improve!!!!
After starting the game, we need to install “Kahoot!”! in our devices:
 Apple Devices
 Google Play Devices
  The overall quizz is here:
 Quizz URL

Project Management This part of the Msc Subject is focused on learning how to manage an ICT project. Indeed, we will focus on the following aspects:
 Define requirements based on an idea (Focus Group) Presentation of Agile Methodology Appliation of Scrum Learn how to make presentation.  We hope you enjoy the subject and the PBL methodology in order to cover all the “start-up” generation starting from generating an idea, implementing it, try to get funding and finally expose it to the customers and product launch.

title: HowTo
content:
This presentation is focused on the methodology to be followed in order to create a presentation. With this regards, we need to know our audience, the theme, highlights of the product/idea and we also need to minimise errors and avoid nervous.
 Presentation (HTML)

title: ScrumHandsOn
content:
In this session we are going to see how to practically implement SCRUM.
 Presentation (HTML)

title: ScrumSession
content:
This session is focused on describing and learning SCRUM. For that, we will learn the SCRUM process and the corresponfing people involved, meetings, artifacts and main parts.
 Presentation (HTML) Presentation and Notes (PDF)

title: Agile Methdology
content:
This section is aimed at explaining the fundamentals of the agile methodology.
 Presentation (HTML) Presentation and Notes (PDF)
